Welcome To Prayag
Multispeciality Hospital

Prayag Multispeciality Hospital is a multispecialty, ultra modern Hospital in NIT Faridabad. It has been established with a mission to provide world class health facilities at affordable cost while maintaining highest standards of ethical practice and professional competency.
